# nvim 配置


## 全局搜索配置

安装repgrep

ubuntu
```
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:x4121/ripgrep
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt install ripgrep
```

mac
```
brew install ripgrep
```

安装 fd

```
npm install -g fd-find

```
